TopicTitle: Conract grouping, comments at rename vessel dialogue, Custom flight types

Articles.Content:
Dear community, Squad,

I realise it's kind of late in the game (pun intended) but i would like to suggest a feature or two, three:

1: **Conract grouping:** I would like to see some way to group active contracts. This would allow you to cluster contracts according to relevance, priority or specific missions.

2: **Comments/description at the ''Rename vessel'' dialogue:** I would like to see space to add comments there. Similar to the way you can add a description at the VAB, underneath the design name. This would allow us to add information that you can revisit at the tracking station. This would seem very usefull when you are directing (very) long term, complex, missions. Especially when you have multiple active missions.

3: **Abillity to archive flights/missions:** Sometimes i have very long term missions or even historic, inactive, operational missions. These add up. I would like a way to ''ghost'' them out af the tracking station. For clarity.

This could likely be combined with my next suggestion:

4: **Custom flights types at tracking station:** For one reason: see suggestion 3. Others might like to group active missions, landed aircraft, satelites, manned missions, interplanetary missions, science missions, test flights, **flags!!**, failures, whatever....

Any thoughts?

Kinds regards,

Robje
